title: Thank You, Monty Keegan!
description:
Monty received this video due to his support on Patreon. To support the Kinda Funny crew go to: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny or http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames 

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here http://www.ORIGINPC.com.


Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what up Monty Keegan thank you Keegan for your support over on patreon.com Kinda Funny Games I'm Greg that's Nick that's Kevin that's Tim and we're road tripping back from VidCon knocking out all these thank you videos wanted to send a Little Love Your Way Nick yo what was your favorite part of VidCon oh the meet and greet the meet and greet is always my favorite part of any of these shows yeah cuz it's an opportunity to just sit down hang out and and talk to fans um least favorite part was trying to get into the last party the maker party yeah that was a fun party but getting in was arguably testing of my patients in a way that has never been tested cuz there was a giant line we got pulled out of line by our people I'm convinced no one went in no one from that line went in either probably so they had the giant line then had the like the area where all the quote unquote VIP people were being walked and we had a hookup

so they had the giant line then had the talent area where Talent maker Talent could go in then they had the like the area where all the quote unquote VIP people were being walked and we had a hookup uh and we know some people over there and they're all very nice and it wasn't Maker's fault it was that inevitably people were starting to get that mob mental yeah where one person would get in and they get jealous and then people would start crowding forward and it almost got to a place where I felt like you remember that scene in The Walking Dead when they're in the prison and they have to keep killing The Walking Dead and if they don't they push the fence down and then they get mobbed that's what it was like I'm like these guys are going to riot there's going to be a riot a very good smelling like good look goodlook people people ranging from the ages of 13 all the way to like 21 yeah exactly well the biggest thing there though is that the riot would have been very interesting because

like Good Look people ranging from the ages of 13 all the way to like 21 yeah exactly well the biggest thing there though is that the riot would have been very interesting because it's not like the party's walls were even walls it was were just like very small like I would call them plants sure maybe flowers best and what's funny is that a couple people tried to hop Over The Hedge yeah and they got caught oh yeah but they got deep into the party and then the sad thing was after the party kind of started to loosen up a little bit cuz you know we always like to just stay way later than we probably should be cool yeah um I don't know if that's the definition of cool I don't really know what cool is okay uh I looked over and I saw a bunch of people that unfortunately couldn't get into the party just staring at us yeah and I'm like this is so awkward but I'm so glad that I'm on this side of yeah exactly we were on the good side we won so I mean that's all we did win we did

get into the party just staring at us yeah and I'm like this is so awkward but I'm so glad that I'm on this side of yeah exactly we were on the good side we won so I mean that's all we did win we did it was a great party good party Warren G was great hair yeah Warren you Hillary Duff was there I didn't see Hillary Duff she was right in front of us saw her we just didn't know you guys know that I obsess and stalk Hillary Duff no we didn't know this well I do I'm telling everyone down on the internet don't tell anyone but uh I really wish You' tap me on the shoulder next time Hillary Duff's in the room and just let at least let me know give me the option to say hello to I probably would well see that's where you were we weren't in a room with her we were outside so that's why figure of speech Greg we went very literal literal interpretation at that little car it's like from the 80s this is the '83 Camaro not the 31 the 323 here that little yeah it looks like a transformer see it there Monty no it's there

we went very literally of speech interaction at that little car it's like from the 80s this is the '31 the '32 here that little yeah it looks like a Transformer, you see it there Monty no it's there Monty thank you thanks money for all your support you make trips like VidCon happen for us where we go and network and make the shows bigger and better and find things to do and get inspired to make new content right Tim yes how many new shows are you thinking of Hillary do okay Tim's got nothing left in the take Mom thank you for your support we love you bye
